pageProduct.name: OGX Renewing Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo 88.7ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OGX Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo is a sulfate free shampoo that helps to penetrate the hair shaft and revives dry damaged hair. This argan oil shampoo is hydrating and moisturising for soft and strong hair.

OGX Renewing+ Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo 
Why You Want It... This exotic, hydrating argan oil shampoo helps to penetrate, moisturise, revive and create softness and strength while helping to protect your hair from harmful styling heat and UV damage. Discover smooth, sexy tresses.

A unique, precious blend with argan oil of Morocco helps to penetrate the hair shaft. Discover newly restored strength, shine, softness, and seductive, silky perfection.


Moisturising shampoo with Argan oil for dry damaged hair

Use for shiny, smooth hair that is stronger

Sulfate free sufactants, (sodium lauryl sulfate) SLS free

Not tested on animals

Size: 88.7mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Travel Size 88.7mL
• Argan Oil
• Restores Strength, Shine & Softness

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately. In case of any discomfort, please discontinue and consult a physician. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Water, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycol Distearate, Citric Acid, Fragrance, Laureth-4, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Citrate, Polyquatemium-22, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Linoleamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, PEG-7 Amodimethicone, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Polyquatemium-39, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, PPG-2 Hydroxyethyl Cocamide, Sodium Hydroxide, CI 19140 (FD&C Yellow 5), CI 17200 (D&C Red 33), Hexylene Glycol.

Directions

What You Do... Apply Shampoo generously to wet hair, massage into a lather through to ends, then rinse the hair thoroughly. After shampooing, follow with conditioner.

USAGE ADVICE

For best results, use in conjunction with other OGX products.
